subject: Investing
title: The Power of Doing Nothing
description: A quick win: understand The Power of Doing Nothing.

hook.text: Fidelity found that their best-performing accounts belonged to people who forgot they had them.

buildup.text: Every action in a portfolioâ€”buying, selling, switchingâ€”carries a cost and a chance of being wrong.

discovery.text: Doing nothing is the hardest decision in investing because it feels lazy. In reality, it's disciplined.

twist.text: Inactivity isn't the same as ignorance. It's a conscious choice to let your plan work without interference.

climax.text: Set your allocation, automate contributions, rebalance once a year, and resist everything else.

punchline.text: The best move in investing is often no move at all.

quiz.question: Why is doing nothing often the best investing strategy?
